title: The Untold Story - Novel Updates
tags: Calm Protagonist   Complex Family Relationships   Death of Loved Ones   Disabilities   Female Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Twentine
description: This story talks about an undercover police who lost his leg during a mission. We do not know much about it as the story starts from his life after losing his leg. He became a taxi-driver and during an accident, he met the female lead. The female lead is a very cold person who does not interact much with other people beside her family and her boss. But there is something very warm about her â€“ the way she treats her brother and him.>
